meanings.definition: (of an organic compound, especially a fat or oil) containing more than one double or triple bond in the molecule.
meanings.sent1: The polyunsaturated oil was healthier than the saturated one.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using polyunsaturated fats in her cooking for a lighter taste.
meanings.sent3: The polyunsaturated oil went on a diet to lose some double bonds.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a polyunsaturated molecule, flexible and open to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The polyunsaturated compound danced gracefully with its double bonds.
